CustomField.description: Formula field that associates a code with ampi__IATI_Aid_Type__c.
CustomField.formula: CASE(ampi__IATI_Aid_Type__c, "General budget support","A01", "Sector budget support","A02", "Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes","B01", "Core contributions to multilateral institutions","B02", "Contributions to specific-purpose programmes and funds managed by international organisations (multilateral, INGO)","B03", "Basket funds/pooled funding","B04", "Project-type interventions","C01", "Donor country personnel","D01", "Other technical assistance","D02", "Scholarships/training in donor country","E01", "Imputed student costs","E02", "Debt relief","F01","Administrative costs not included elsewhere","G01", "Development awareness","H01", "Refugees in donor countries","H02",null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Code corresponding to IATI Aid Type
CustomField.label: IATI Aid Type Code
